register_body_continue: Tell us something about you. We want to know the player 's inside you!

error.not_found: 404. Oops, the route could not be found.
error.email_error_patron: The email must be like example@example.com
error.password_error_patron: The password must have lowercase, uppercase and numbers

about_us.ar: Software engineering student. Specializing in web application development and guitar lover and music. Currently in the final year career and working in everis.
about_us.cp: Software engineering student. Specializing in web application development and a videogames lover. Currently in the final year career and working in Sopra Steria.
about_us.fjv: Software engineering student. Specializing in web application development and football lover and cinema. Currently in the final year career and working in everis.

email.verification-email_message1: Thanks so much for joining us! We are delighted by you arrival!
email.verification-email_message2: The last step for use our app is just click here and we'll redirect you to Nexlu
email.verification-email_message3: We hope you'll enjoyed it and if you like our app, just say it to your player friends!

thanks.text-register: We've sent a message to your email to activate your account . See you soon!

faq.answer_one: We are a social network specializing in video games. We are still in development but will soon have focused improvements to the area of video games!
faq.answer_two: The behavior is similar to other social networks, so all you can do in the other can make them here! The advantage is that all you'll find here will be related to video games!
faq.answer_three: Of course! We open doors! Simply send us an email!

terms.terms11: These Terms of Service (“Terms”) govern your use of the services offered by Nexlu, Inc., a Seville corporation ("Nexlu") via the Nexlu website, any Nexlu mobile application (the “Application”) or any other services offered by Nexlu (collectively, the “Services”). These Terms are entered into by you and Nexlu. PLEASE READ THESE TERMS CAREFULLY BEFORE ACCESSING OR USING THE SERVICES. In these Terms, the words “including” and “include” mean “including, but not limited to“.
terms.terms12: By using the Services, you agree to be bound by these Terms and acknowledge the Terms of Use, which govern access to and use of the Website and the Application (the “Terms of Use”), and the Privacy Policy, which explains how Nexlu, collects, uses, and shares your information (the “Privacy Policy”). If you do not wish to agree to these Terms, the Terms of Use or the Privacy Policy, you must not access or use the Services. Nexlu may immediately terminate these Terms or any of the Services with respect to you, or generally cease offering or deny access to the Services or any portion thereof, at any time for any reason.
terms.terms13: The Services are offered and available to users who are 18 years of age or older and reside in Spain or any of its territories or possessions. By using the Services, you represent and warrant that you are of legal age to form a binding contract with Nexlu. If you do not meet all of these requirements, you may not access or use the Services.
terms.terms14: In certain situations, the Services may require supplemental terms, such as policies for a particular event, activity or promotion. These supplemental terms will be disclosed to you in connection with the applicable Services. Supplemental terms are in addition to, and shall be deemed a part of, these Terms for the purposes of the applicable Services. In the event of a conflict between any supplemental terms and these Terms, the supplemental terms shall prevail over these Terms only with respect to the applicable services.
terms.terms15: Nexlu reserves the right, at its sole discretion, to modify the Website, the Application, or the Services, or to modify these Terms, including any fees for the Services, at any time and without prior notice to you. If Nexlu modifies these Terms, it will either post the modification on the Website or the Application or otherwise provide you with notice of the modification. Nexlu will also update the “Last Updated Date” at the top of these Terms. By continuing to access or use the Website, the Application or the Services after Nexlu has posted a modification, you are indicating that you agree to be bound by the modified Terms. If the modified Terms are not acceptable to you, your only recourse is to cease using the Website, the Application, and the Services.
terms.terms21: The Services are communication platforms that facilitate the connection between you, the user of the Services, and third party providers, including independent third party labor providers under agreement with Nexlu (“Third Party Providers”), to arrange and schedule labor services performed by such Third Party Providers and NOT Nexlu.
